content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Service Gateway Firmware Version 3.0.7 April 22, 2024—Service Gateway Firmware Version 3.0.7 includes enhancements, bug fixes, and security updates for Service Gateway. This update includes the following changes: This update supports the following virtual appliance specifications: 12 cores CPU, 16 GB memory, 500 GB storage 8 cores CPU, 12 GB memory, 200 GB storage This update adds an enhancement to support an upcoming new service. This update adds a bug fix for network issues caused by dual network cards. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
